summary: Simply makes hireling companion Stenvar a little bit younger.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to change Stenvar\'s face so he looks a bit younger? Well this mod is for you! I simply changed Stenvar\'s hair color black, removed his beard and replaced it with stubble, made his body weight 100, and removed his wrinkles. Simply extract to your Skyrim folder, and it should start up.

There should be no conflicts, unless you have another mod that alters Stenvar in any way.

REQUIRES: nothingâ€”however I would recommend a few mods if you want results like the screen shots:
	
Project ENB by Bronze316
	
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox
	
aMidianBorn Steel Armor by CaBaL

Beards by Hvergelmir

High Quality Eyes by Xenius
author: Mark02o
